sections.title: Compensation Study
sections.description: The planned current project(s) (appendix 1) is extensively documented with participation of Prof. Schseveeecn and Dr. Lindlnbrg. All participants agree that the planned study is scientifically sound and justifiable, and commands a significant amount of time and financial expenditure. The study will be conducted if the board approves the project.

timeline.event: Submit proposal to the board meeting
Selection of the treatment group by questionnaire
Meeting of the scientific committee for the research project (including the participation of plant doctors)

sections.notes: Senior is regarded by his demand as of great merit and political significance. An attempt will be made in the study to contribute to the clarification of the problem. It is planned to study the following annual, optimistic uptake by organism structures:
sections.additional_notes: An attempt will be made to study how and to what extent the uptake varies with the different amounts.
